name: Cyber Slayer (itch)
description:
Cyber Slayer is an isometric top-down action shooter cyberpunk game, which was created as a demo for a school project I worked on for three months. While the demo features only one level, I have a list of additions and changes I would like to make to the game in near future. These include an overhaul of the graphics, more detailed textures on some objects, the addition of grenades, and destructible objects.

It's worth noting that the project employs copyrighted music, but it is used only for showcasing the gameplay and visual style,  not for any commercial purposes. I have no intention of making any money from this project.
